<h3 id="X39884">X(39884) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^6-(b^2+c^2)*a^4+4*b^2*c^2*a^2-3*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39884) = 5*X(3)-7*X(3619) = 3*X(3)-X(14927) = 5*X(4)-X(193) = 3*X(4)-X(1351) = 3*X(4)+X(5921) = 3*X(5)-2*X(182) = 5*X(5)-4*X(3589) = 4*X(5)-3*X(38110) = 7*X(5)-6*X(38317) = 3*X(193)-5*X(1351) = 3*X(193)+5*X(5921) = X(193)+5*X(18440) = 2*X(193)-5*X(21850) = X(1351)+3*X(18440) = 2*X(1351)-3*X(21850) = 7*X(3619)-10*X(18358) = X(5921)-3*X(18440) = 2*X(5921)+3*X(21850) = X(14927)-6*X(18358) = 2*X(18440)+X(21850)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39884) lies on these lines: {3,3619}, {4,193}, {5,182}, {6,546}, {30,599}, {66,31833}, {69,382}, {110,427}, {113,15432}, {140,10516}, {141,550}, {146,32306}, {155,16198}, {159,7526}, {381,6776}, <p>
X(39884) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 18440}, {69, 382}, {113, 32250}, {146, 32306}, {1351, 5921}, {1352, 36990}, {1843, 12162}, {3146, 33878}, {3830, 11180}, {10752, 32272}, {11381, 37511}, {12315, 20079}, {12699, 39885}, {13202, 32275}, {13474, 14913}, {15069, 31670}, {18507, 39886}, {18525, 39898}<br>
X(39884) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3, 18358), (5, 3818), (6, 546), (141, 18553), (550, 141), (1353, 5480), (3313, 11591), (6102, 9969), (6776, 18583), (8550, 19130), (8703, 11178), (10264, 32274), (11179, 5066), (11579, 11801), (15583, 18383), (15704, 3098), (20423, 14893), (21850, 4), (31670, 3853), (32233, 10272), (34776, 16252), (34779, 5893), (34785, 15585), (39870, 9955)<br>
X(39884) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 5921, 1351), (6, 546, 38136), (381, 6776, 18583), (1351, 18440, 5921), (1353, 3845, 5480), (3091, 39874, 5050), (3843, 39899, 14853), (5066, 11179, 38079), (9955, 39870, 38040), (17508, 34573, 14869)<br>
</p>
